item.title: An assesment of humanity from past to present. The good, the bad and the ugly
item.description: Past: 20th century AD and before Not so bad Humans still learning and adapting to nature More physical work to do. Less comfortable physical existence in terms of housing, clothing, heating, energy, health facility, food production etc. Higher mortality risk. Attack from animals. Climate. Weather. Diseases. Not such a developed surgery and medical system in west. But there was Ayurveda and chi gung in East. Uncleanliness and hygene The ugly Problems faced by humans between humans Communalism and division between human to human Attack from each other - loot, crimes and war Ruled by power and fear - State, Religion The good The good in the past For every human the world was full of wonders to be discovered!
